text: And the Violins Stopped Playing () is a 1988 Polish American World War II drama movie directed by and based on the novel by Alexander Ramati. It stars Horst Buchholz, Piotr Polk, Marne Maitland, Jan Machulski, Aleksander Bardini, Jerzy Nowak, Wladyslaw Komar, Wiktor Zborowski, Aleksander Ford, Wiesław Wójcik and was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 drama movies Category:1988 war movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books
title: And the Violins Stopped Playing
